name: The Grinch Actually Steals Christmas!
description:
What would happen if the Grinch actually stole Christmas? Now that is a good question. 

Here's the story:

(You play as a katana wielding Santa Claus)

Stage 1: The Whos have went on a rampage and are using mechanized suits to reek havoc upon everything they see, you must stop them.

Stage 2: You must ride up mount Krumpet, dodging traps, trees, snowmen and more, in order to reach the final battle.

Stage 3: You have finally reached the top of the mountain, you now must battle the Grinch!

Please comment what you like about the game, what you dislike about the game, what you think should be changed, added etc. Just please tell me what you think of the game that I made in the past 5 days!
